definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: Objective To prepare the stabilizer of freeze-dried recombinant MVA virus vector vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 目的研製重組MVA病毒載體疫苗的耐熱凍幹保護劑。

sentences.english: Metallothionein is a hopeful agent for cell protection.
sentences.chinese: 金屬硫蛋白是個有希望的細胞保護劑。

sentences.english: It contains water , hydrated lime , a tree protectant and red food color .
sentences.chinese: 它包含了水，石灰，樹木保護劑和食用紅色素。

sentences.english: Antioxidants will develop a new effective gastric mucosa protectant with vast prospects.
sentences.chinese: 抗氧化劑作爲粘膜保護劑將具有很大應用前景。

sentences.english: The progresses in brain protective agent researches have been greatly concerned in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 腦保護劑的研究進展近年來備受關注。

sentences.english: Theoretical analysis was made for the addition and removal of cryoprotectants.
sentences.chinese: 對低溫保護劑加入和取出過程進行了理論研究。

sentences.english: Trehalose is a kind of preservative agent which has potential application.
sentences.chinese: 海藻糖是一種具有廣闊應用前景的生物保護劑。

sentences.english: The volatile oil of Vitex negundo has immense potential to be exploited as grain protectant.
sentences.chinese: 黃荊揮發油作爲儲糧保護劑具有很大開發潛力。

sentences.english: May be used as a protectant against further irritation.
sentences.chinese: 可以作爲保護劑抵制進一步的過敏。

sentences.english: The optimum formula of active dried yeast protector for cider was systematically studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 對釀酒活性乾酵母的最佳保護劑配方進行了系統研究。

sentences.english: To learn the toxicity and safety of the biological crop protective agent.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解生物農藥莊稼保護劑的毒性和安全性。

sentences.english: Spray the boot with water-based weather protector to help keep it looking brand new.
sentences.chinese: 噴灑保護劑，讓靴子看上去像新的一樣。

sentences.english: This paper presented the research on detoxification with antidote to long residual herbicides in greenhouse and field test.
sentences.chinese: 利用田間試驗方法研究保護劑長殘效除草劑解毒效應。

sentences.english: The formulation of protectant for lyophilized Lactobacillus plantarum was optimized by means of response surface methodology.
sentences.chinese: 採用響應面法對植物乳桿菌凍幹保護劑配比進行優化。

sentences.english: It is the natural protection preferred by Piacenza Cashmere.
sentences.chinese: 該天然保護劑特別適用於皮亞琴查山羊絨。

sentences.english: Mannitol is usually used as a cryoprotectant and an excipient during pharmaceutical freeze-drying.
sentences.chinese: 甘露醇是藥品冷凍乾燥中常用的低溫保護劑和賦形劑。
